data.title: Conway Twitty
data.text:
AKA Harold Lloyd Jenkins

Born: 1-Sep-1933

Birthplace: Friars Point, MS

Died: 5-Jun-1993

Location of death: Springfield, MO

Cause of death: Aneurysm

Remains: Buried, Sumner Memorial Park, Gallatin, TN

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Country Musician

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: It's Only Make Believe

Military service: US Army (drafted)

Father: (riverboat pilot)

Wife: Mikey (four children)

Wife: Dee Henry (m. 1987, until his death)

Son: Michael Twitty

Country Music Hall of Fame 1998

Rockabilly Hall of Fame

Nashville Songwriters Hall of Fame

Fainted Branson, MO (1992)

Welsh Ancestry

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR
